verses.text: PEA folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ‘o pehē,
Ko eni ‘a e tu‘utu‘uni ki he kilia ‘i he ‘aho ‘o hono fakama‘a: ‘e ‘omi ia ki he taula‘eiki.
Pea ‘e ‘alu ‘a e taula‘eiki ki he tu‘a ‘apitanga, pea te ne vakai ia; pea ka ‘iloange kuo mole mei he kilia ‘a e mahaki,
pea ‘e toki fekau ‘e he taula‘eiki ke kumi mai ma‘a e tangata ‘e fakama‘a ha ongo manupuna mo‘ui, ‘i he fa‘ahinga ‘oku ma‘a, pea mo ha va‘a sita, pea mo ha kula-‘aho‘aho, pea mo ha ‘īsope.
Pea ‘e fekau ‘e he taula‘eiki ke tāmate‘i ha manupuna ‘e taha ‘i ha funga ipu ‘umea ‘oku ‘i ai ha vai mo‘ui.

Pea ko e me‘a ki he manupuna ‘oku kei mo‘ui, te ne to‘o ia mo e va‘a sita, mo e kula ‘aho‘aho, mo e ‘īsope, pea te ne unu kotoa fakataha mo e manupuna mo‘ui ki he toto ‘o e manu na‘e tāmate‘i ‘i he funga ‘o e vai mo‘ui:
pea te ne afuhi ‘aki, ‘o tu‘o fitu, ‘a e taha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a mei he kilia; pea te ne tala ki ai kuo ne ma‘a; pea te ne tukuange ‘a e manupuna mo‘ui ke ‘alu ki he vao.

Pea ko e tokotaha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a te ne fō hono kofu, mo tele hono fulufulu kotoa, mo kaukau ‘i ha vai, pea te ne toki ma‘a; pea hili ia te ne hū mai ki he ‘apitanga, ka te ne nofo ‘i hono tu‘a tēniti ‘o ‘aho fitu.

Pea ‘i hono ‘aho fitu te ne tele ‘a e fulufulu kotoa ‘o hono ‘ulu mo hono kava mo hono kemo, ‘io, ko hono fulufulu kotoa ‘e tele: pea te ne fō hono kofu, pea te ne kaukau hono sino ‘i ha vai, pea te ne toki ma‘a.

Pea ‘i hono ‘aho valu te ne ‘omi ha ongo lami tangata haohaoa, pea mo ha lami fefine ‘e taha, haohaoa pea ‘i hono ‘uluaki ta‘u, pea mo e vahehongofulu ‘e tolu ‘o e ‘elito‘i mahoa‘a kuo natu ‘aki ‘a e lolo, ma‘ane feilaulau-me‘akai, pea mo ha ipu lolo.
Pea ko e taula‘eiki ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e fakama‘a te ne fokotu‘u ‘a e tangata ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a, pea mo e ngaahi me‘a ko ē, ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova ‘i he mata Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga.
Pea ‘e to‘o ‘e he taula‘eiki ha lami tangata ‘e taha, pea te ne ‘atu ia ko e feilaulau-halaia, pea mo e ipu lolo; pea te ne tātākalo ‘aki kinaua ko e feilaulau-tākalo ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova.

Pea te ne tāmate‘i ‘a e lami tangata ‘i he potu ‘oku tāmate‘i ai ‘a e feilaulau-angahala mo e feilaulau-mōifua, ‘i he potu ‘oku tu‘u ai ‘a e Fale Tapu: he hangē ‘oku ‘a e taula‘eiki ‘a e feilaulau-angahala, ‘oku pehē mo e feilaulau-halaia: ko ha me‘a toputapu ia.

Pea ‘e to‘o ‘e he taula‘eiki ha me‘i toto mei he feilaulau-halaia, pea te ne ‘ai ia ki he mua‘i telinga to‘omata‘u ‘o e tokotaha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a, pea ki hono motu‘a nima to‘omata‘u, pea ki hono motu‘a va‘e to‘omata‘u.
Pea ‘e to‘o ‘e he taula‘eiki ha me‘i lolo mei he ipu, ‘o lilingi ki hono ‘aofinima to‘ohema ‘o‘ona:
pea ‘e unu ‘e he taula‘eiki ‘a e tuhu ‘o hono nima to‘omata‘u ‘i he lolo ‘oku ‘i hono ‘aofinima to‘ohema, pea te ne afuhi ‘aki tu‘o fitu ki he ‘ao ‘o Sihova.

Pea te ne ‘ai ha me‘a mei he lolo ‘oku toe ‘i hono ‘aofinima, ki he mua‘i telinga to‘omata‘u ‘o e tokotaha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a, pea ki hono motu‘a nima to‘omata‘u, pea ki hono motu‘a va‘e to‘omata‘u, ki he funga toto ‘o e feilaulau-angahala:
pea ko hono toe ‘o e lolo ‘i hono ‘aofinima te ne ‘ai ki he ‘ulu ‘o e taha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a: pea ‘e fai ai ‘e he taula‘eiki ha fakalelei ma‘ana ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova.
Pea ‘e feia ‘e he taula‘eiki ‘a e feilaulau-angahala, ‘o ne fai‘aki ‘a e fakalelei ma‘a e taha ‘oku fakama‘a, koe‘uhi ko ‘ene ta‘ema‘a; pea hili ia te ne tāmate‘i ‘a e feilaulau-mōifua:
pea ‘e toki ‘atu ‘e he taula‘eiki ‘i he ‘ōlita ‘a e feilaulau-mōifua mo e feilaulau-me‘akai, ‘o fai ‘a e fakalelei ma‘ana: pea te ne ma‘a ai.

Ka ‘o kapau ko e masiva, ‘o ‘ikai te ne lava ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia, pea te ne toki ‘omi ha lami tangata ‘e toko taha ma‘ane feilaulau-halaia, ke tātākalo ‘aki mo fai fakalelei ‘aki ma‘ana, pea mo e vahehongofulu ‘e taha ‘o e ‘elito‘i mahoa‘a kuo natu ‘aki ‘a e lolo, ma‘ane feilaulau-me‘akai, mo ha ipu lolo;
pea mo ha ongo kulukulu pe lupe mui, ha me‘a pē te ne lava ke ma‘u; pea ‘e fai‘aki ‘a e taha ha feilaulau-angahala, pea ko e taha ko e feilaulau-mōifua.
Pea ‘i hono ‘aho valu te ne ‘omi ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ko ia ki he taula‘eiki, ki he mata Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga, ki he ‘ao ‘o Sihova, mōno fakama‘a.
Pea ‘e to‘o ‘e he taula‘eiki ‘a e lami feilaulau-halaia, pea mo e ipu lolo, pea te ne tātākalo ‘aki kinaua ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova mo‘o feilaulau-tākalo.

Pea te ne tāmate‘i ‘a e lami feilaulau-halaia, pea te ne to‘o ha me‘i toto mei ai, pea te ne ‘ai ki he mu‘a‘i telinga to‘omata‘u ‘o e toko taha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a, pea ki hono motu‘a nima to‘omata‘u mo hono motu‘a va‘e to‘omata‘u.
Pea ‘e lingi ‘e he taula‘eiki ha me‘i lolo ki hono ‘aofinima to‘ohema ‘o‘ona;
pea te ne afuhi ‘aki ‘a e tuhu ‘o hono nima to‘omata‘u ha me‘i lolo mei hono ‘aofinima to‘ohema, ‘o tātu‘ofitu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova.

Pea te ne ‘ai ha me‘i lolo mei hono ‘aofinima ki he mua‘i telinga to‘omata‘u ‘o e tokotaha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a, pea ki hono motu‘a nima to‘omata‘u, mo hono motu‘a va‘e to‘omata‘u, ‘i he potu ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e toto ‘o e feilaulau-halaia;
pea ko hono toe ‘o e lolo ‘oku ‘i hono ‘aofinima te ne ‘ai ki he ‘ulu ‘o e tokotaha ‘oku fai hono fakama‘a, ke fai‘aki ha fakalelei ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova.
Pea te ne feia ha taha ‘o e ongo kulukulu pe lupe mui, ‘a e me‘a kuo ne lava ke ma‘u;

‘io te ne fai‘aki ha taha ‘o e me‘a kuo ne lava ke ma‘u ma‘ane feilaulau-angahala, mo e taha ma‘ane feilaulau-mōifua; fakataha mo e feilaulau-me‘akai: pea ‘e fai ai ‘e he taula‘eiki ha fakalelei ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova ma‘ana ‘oku fakama‘a.
Ko e lao ia ki he mahaki kilia, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ke ma‘u ‘a e me‘a mōno fakama‘a.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone, ‘o pehē,
Ka mou ka a‘u ki he fonua ko Kēnani, ‘a ia ‘oku ou ‘atu mo‘omou tofi‘a, pea ka u ka tuku ‘a e mala ko e kilia ki ha fale ‘i he fonua ‘oku mou tofi‘a ‘aki:
pea ko ia ‘oku ‘o‘ona ‘a e fale te ne ha‘u ‘o tala ki he taula‘eiki, ‘o pehē, ‘oku matamata kiate au ‘oku ai ha mala ‘i he fale.

Pea ‘e fekau ‘e he taula‘eiki ke nau fetukutuku mei he fale ‘i he te‘eki ke ne hū ki ai ke vakai ‘a e mala, na‘a ta‘ema‘a ‘a e me‘a kotoa ‘oku ‘i ai: pea hili ia pea ‘e toki hū ‘a e taula‘eiki ke vakai ‘a e fale.
Pea ka mamata ia ki he mala, pea tā ‘oku ‘i he holisi ia, ko e fanga ki‘i luoluo ‘oku meimei lanumata pe kulokula, pea matamata ‘asi ki loto;
pea ‘e toki hū kitu‘a ‘a e taula‘eiki, ‘o ‘alu ki he matapā ‘o e fale, ‘o ne tāpuni ‘a e fale ‘o ‘aho fitu.
Pea ‘e foki mai ‘a e taula‘eiki ‘i hono ‘aho fitu ke vakai; pea ka ‘iloange kuo mafola ‘a e mala ‘i he holisi ‘o e fale;
pea te ne tu‘utu‘uni ke ta‘aki mai ‘a e ngaahi maka ‘oku ‘i ai ‘a e mala, ‘o ‘ave ki he tu‘a kolo, ki ha potu ‘oku ta‘ema‘a:
pea te ne fekau ke vau ‘a e fale takatakai, pea ke nau lilingi ‘a e efu ‘oku vau ki ha potu ta‘ema‘a ‘oku ‘i he tu‘a kolo.
Pea te nau kumi maka kehe, ‘o fetongi ‘aki ‘a e maka ko ē, pea te ne to‘o ha lahe kehe, ‘o vali ‘aki ‘a e fale.
Pea kapau ‘e foki mai ‘a e mala, ‘o hā ‘i he fale hili ‘ene ta‘aki ‘a e ngaahi maka mo vali ‘a e fale, pea hili hono vali;
pea ‘e ha‘u ‘a e taula‘eiki; pea ka vakai ‘e ia tā kuo mafola ‘a e mala ‘i he fale, ko e kilia fakapopo ia ‘oku ‘i he fale: ‘oku ta‘ema‘a ia.
Pea te ne holoki ‘a e fale, ‘a hono ngaahi maka mo e ‘akau mo e lahe kotoa; pea te ne ‘ave ki tu‘a kolo, ki ha potu ‘oku ta‘ema‘a.
Pea ko ia te ne hū ki he fale lolotonga kuo tāpuni, te ne ta‘ema‘a ‘o a‘u ki he efiafi.
Pea ko ia te ne mohe ‘i he fale te ne fō hono kofu; pea ko ia te ne kai ‘i he fale te ne fō hono kofu.
Ka ‘o kapau ‘e ha‘u ‘a e taula‘eiki, ‘o ne vakai, tā kuo ‘ikai mafola ‘a e mala ‘i he fale hili hono vali; pea ‘e toki fakahā ‘e he taula‘eiki ‘oku ma‘a ‘a e fale, he kuo mo‘ui ‘a e mala.
Pea te ne kumi mai ha holo ki he fale, ko e ongo manupuna, mo ha va‘a sita, mo ha kula ‘aho‘aho, pea mo ha ‘īsope.
Pea te ne tāmate‘i ha manupuna ‘e taha ‘i ha funga ipu ‘umea ‘oku ‘i ai ha vai mo‘ui:

pea te ne to‘o ‘a e va‘a sita mo e ‘īsope mo e kula-‘aho‘aho fakataha mo e manupuna ‘oku mo‘ui, pea te ne unu kotoa ki he toto ‘o e manupuna na‘e tāmate‘i, pea mo e vai mo‘ui, pea te ne afuhi ‘aki ‘a e fale ‘o tu‘o fitu:
pea te ne fakama‘a ‘a e fale ‘aki ‘a e toto ‘o e manupuna, mo e vai mo‘ui, mo e manupuna mo‘ui, mo e va‘a sita, mo e ‘īsope, pea mo e kula-‘aho‘aho:
ka te ne tukuange ‘a e manupuna mo‘ui ke ‘alu mei he kolo ki he vao: ‘o ne fai ai ‘a e fakalelei koe‘uhi ko e fale, pea ‘e toki ma‘a.
Ko e lao ia ki he mahaki kilia, hono ngaahi fa‘ahinga kehekehe, pea ki he kamā;
pea ki he kilia ‘i ha kofu pe fale;
pea ki ha hangatāmaki, pe mongumangu, pe tane;
ke fakahinohino ki he taimi ‘o ‘ene ta‘ema‘a mo e taimi ‘o ‘ene ma‘a: ko eni ia ‘a e lao ‘o e kilia.
